properties.title: Kakadu Demonstration Apps for OSX10.7 up

pkmkdoc.description: Kakadu demonstration executables for Mac OSX10.7 and above.

choice.title: libkdu_v72R
choice.description: Core system shared library. All the demo apps rely upon this. If you choose to put it in a custom location, you will need to make sure that location is in the dynamic load path from wherever you tend to run the apps. This is easy to arrange for applications invoked from a BSD shell, since all you need to do is set the DYLD_LD_LIBRARY path in your ".profile" file. However, to run the "kdu_show" application directly from the finder, you have to go to a lot more work to let the system know about a custom dynamic load path. For these reasons, we recommend you leave the destination as is.

choice.title: kdu_buffered_compress
choice.description: Run this application from a BSD shell.

choice.description: Run this application from a BSD shell.

choice.title: kdu_show
choice.description: Typically run from the Finder, but you may execute the application from a BSD shell using "open -a kdu_show".

choice.title: kdu_jp2info
choice.description: Run this application from a BSD shell.

requirement.message: These executables are compiled against the 10.7 SDK to support OSX Lion and above. There is a separate installation package that is compiled against the 10.5 SDK to support OSX Leopard and Snow Leopard.
